name: DeepGolf
description:
DEEP GOLF How deep can be a golf game?  Ludum Dare 48, Theme : Deeper & Deeper Controls :

      Mouse Drag      -->   Aim

  Release button    -->   Shoot 

                       Space   -->   Restart the level

                                 R   -->   Restarts the game (and the timer)

Ball must be thrown to Restart with R or SPACE

Made by : 
  • Benoit Deneaux  --> Developer 
  • Rendy  --> Developer
  • Dorian Ribeiro --> Level Designer
ChangeLog :

27/04/2021 :  Bug Fix : Prevent Restart when Sticked on White Plateform (preventing ending the game prematurely)

29/04/2021 :  Fix Pause & End UI for responsive format
